MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:02am in the LL40 postcode area of Dolgellau following reports of a grounded overhead line on Cader Road. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to site and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:06am on 12th February 2021.
